embeds.title: Barrington Jones ("Bear") makes a Perception check!
Sydoris Larksson makes a Perception check!
Varison Naïlo makes a Perception check!

fields.name: Description
fields.value:
Traveling to a wilderness zone requires one travel token.
You have three travel tokens, which reset on a long rest. 
Each time you take a short rest, you regain one travel token. You can regain a number of travel tokens equal to your proficency bonus between each long rest.
Use `!travel` to travel.

embeds.title: Dame Krieg makes a Perception check!
Varison Naïlo makes a Perception check!

fields.name: Eyes of the Eagle
fields.value: You have advantage of Perception checks that rely on sight.

messages.content:
```md
Current initiative: 3 (round 2)
===============================
  27: Rak <87/87 HP, 13 temp> (AC 18, Hex [59.9 minutes], Hexing [59.9 minutes])
  16: Miarze <38/38 HP, 13 temp> (AC 18)
  16: Freckle R Jellicle <39/39 HP, 13 temp> (AC 13)
  15: Barrington Jones ("Bear") <58/58 HP, 5 temp> (AC 16)
  11: Dame Krieg <45/45 HP, 14 temp> (AC 16)
   9: SoIW6 <Dead> 
#  3: Varison Naïlo <66/66 HP, 16 temp> (AC 19, Spiritual Weapon [9 rounds])
   2: SoIW1 <Dead> (Hexed [59.9 minutes])``` ```-----COMBAT ENDED-----```
Pinned a message.

Everyone roll for initiative!
If you have a character set up with SheetManager: `!init join`
If it's a 5e monster: `!init madd <monster name>`
Otherwise: `!init add <modifier> <name>`
Messages sent in this channel during combat will be recorded for research purposes. By sending messages in this channel during this combat, you agree to participate in the Avrae NLP study. See `!init nlp` for more information.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: After a Short or Long Rest, give a performance. When you do, up to six allies (which can include yourself) within 30 ft. of yourself gain Temporary HP equal to your Character Level + your wisdom modifier.

messages.content:
**Initiative 27 (round 1)**: Rak (@Rak [12] || Dusk)
```md
Rak <87/87 HP, 13 temp> (AC 18)```

fields.name: Rak
fields.value: **Effect**: Hexing [60.0 minutes] (Attack: Hex; Attack: Shift Hex; Parent: Hex)

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: You place a curse on a creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 Necrotic damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll. Also, choose one ability when you cast the spell. The target has Disadvantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability. If the target drops to 0 Hit Points before this spell ends, you can take a Bonus Action on a later turn to curse a new creature.

fields.name: At Higher Levels
fields.value: Your Concentration can last longer with a spell slot of level 2 (up to 4 hours), 3-4 (up to 8 hours), or 5+ (24 hours).

fields.name: SoIW2
fields.value:
**To Hit**: 2d20kh1 (~~**1**~~, 16) + 7 = `23`
**Damage**: 1d8 (6) + 3 [magical psychic] + 1d8 (**1**) [magical radiant] + 1d6 (2) [necrotic] + 2d6 (**6**, **1**) [magical psychic] + 3 [magical psychic] + 2d6 (**1**, 3) [magical psychic] = `26`

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
* ***Pact Weapon.*** You can use your Charisma modifier for this weapon, and cause it to deal Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage instead of its normal damage type.
* ***Extra Damage.*** When you hit, you deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage.
* ***Restoration.*** You can use one of three daily charges to restore HP equal to the radiant damage from the Extra Damage feature.
* ***Light.*** You can use a Bonus Action to shed bright/dim light in a 30/30ft. radius, dim in a 10ft. radius, or no light.

fields.name: Hex
fields.value: You deal an extra 1d6 Necrotic damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack roll.

fields.name: Sneak Attack
fields.value: You can deal an extra 2d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have Advantage on the roll and the attack uses a Finesse or Ranged weapon, or an unincapacitated ally is within 5 feet of the target and you do not have Disadvantage on the roll. The extra damage's type is the same as the weapon's type.

fields.name: Assassinate
fields.value: During the first round of combat, you have Advantage on attacks against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. If your Sneak Attack hits any target during that round, the target takes an additional 3 damage of the weapon's type.

fields.name: Bugbear Surprise Attack
fields.value: If you hit a creature that has not taken a turn yet in the current combat with an attack roll, it takes an extra 2d6 damage.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: You can push yourself beyond your normal limits for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
* ***Pact Weapon.*** You can use your Charisma modifier for this weapon, and cause it to deal Necrotic, Psychic, or Radiant damage instead of its normal damage type.
* ***Extra Damage.*** When you hit, you deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage.
* ***Restoration.*** You can use one of three daily charges to restore HP equal to the radiant damage from the Extra Damage feature.
* ***Light.*** You can use a Bonus Action to shed bright/dim light in a 30/30ft. radius, dim in a 10ft. radius, or no light.

fields.name: Bugbear Surprise Attack
fields.value: If you hit a creature that has not taken a turn yet in the current combat with an attack roll, it takes an extra 2d6 damage.

 - The target has disadvantage on ability checks made with the chosen ability```

**Initiative 16 (round 1)**: Miarze (@Miarze [5] || Penny)
```md
Miarze <38/38 HP, 13 temp> (AC 18)```
SoIW2 automatically removed from combat.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
Proficiency with a Quarterstaff allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.




---


This weapon has the following mastery property. To use this property, you must have a feature that lets you use it.


***Topple.*** If you hit a creature with this weapon, you can force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 plus the ability modifier used to make the attack roll and your Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, the creature has the Prone condition.

embeds.title: Miarze attacks with an Unarmed Strike!

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You make a melee attack that involves using your body to deal one of the following effects:
***Damage.*** You make an attack roll against the creature, and on a hit, you deal 1 + STR Bludgeoning damage.
***Grapple.*** The target must succeed on a Str./Dex. (it chooses which) saving throw (DC = 8 + Prof. Bonus + Str.) or it has the Grappled condition.
***Shove.*** The target must succeed on a Str./Dex. (it chooses which) saving throw (DC = 8 + Prof. Bonus + Str.) or you can either push it 5 ft. away or cause it to have the Prone condition.

embeds.title: Freckle R Jellicle uses Mantle of Inspiration!

footer.text:
Varison Naïlo: <66/66 HP, 16 temp>
Dame Krieg: <45/45 HP, 14 temp>
Barrington Jones ("Bear"): <58/58 HP, 16 temp>
Freckle R Jellicle: <39/39 HP, 13 temp>

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You can weave fey magic into a song or dance to fill others with vigor.
As a Bonus Action, you can expend a use of Bardic Inspiration, rolling a Bardic Inspiration die. When you do so, choose a number of other creatures within 60 feet of yourself, up to a number equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of one creature). Each of those creatures gains a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to two times the number rolled on the Bardic Inspiration die, and then each can use its Reaction to move up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks.

embeds.title: Freckle R Jellicle casts Starry Wisp!

fields.name: SoIW5
fields.value:
**To Hit**: 1d20 (19) + 7 = `26`
**Damage**: 2d8 (**1**, 4) [magical radiant] = `5`
**Effect**: Glowing [until end of Freckle R Jellicle's turn]

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You launch a mote of light at one creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 Radiant damage, and until the end of your next turn, it emits Dim Light in a 10-foot radius and can’t benefit from the Invisible condition.
**Cantrip Upgrade.** The damage increases by 1d8 when you reach levels 5 (2d8), 11 (3d8), and 17 (4d8).

embeds.title: Barrington Jones ("Bear") attacks with a Halberd!

fields.name: Heavy Weapon Mastery
fields.value: When you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Heavy property as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target. The extra damage equals your Proficiency Bonus.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value: if you hit a creature with a melee attack using a Halberd, you can make another melee attack with it against a second creature within 5 ft. of the first that's within your reach. On a hit, the second creature takes the Halberd's damage, but without your ability modifier (unless the modifier is negative).

messages.content: Attack not found.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You brandish the weapon used in the spell's casting and make a melee attack with it against one creature within 5 feet of you. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and you can cause green fire to leap from the target to a different creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of it. The second creature takes fire damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier.

This spell's damage increases when you reach certain levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 fire damage to the target on a hit, and the fire damage to the second creature increases to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. Both damage rolls increase by 1d8 at 11th level (2d8 and 2d8) and 17th level (3d8 and 3d8).

fields.value: When you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Heavy property as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target. The extra damage equals your Proficiency Bonus.

fields.value: If your attack roll with a Glaive misses a creature, you can deal damage to it equal to the ability modifier used to make the attack. This damage is the same type dealt by the Glaive, and can only be increased by increasing the ability modifier.

fields.name: Effect
fields.value:
You create a floating, spectral force that resembles a weapon of your choice and lasts for the duration. The force appears within range in a space of your choice, and you can immediately make one melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of the force. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.
As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the force up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.
**Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot.** The damage increases by 1d8 for every slot level above 2.
